DOC.brief_summary: A 30-week extension to a 24-week study assessing the hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)- and fasting plasma glucose (FPG)-lowering efficacy of the combination of sitagliptin and pioglitazone in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) with inadequate glycemic control.
DOC.brief_title: 30-Week Extension to an Initial Combination Study (24 Weeks in Duration) of Sitagliptin With Pioglitazone (0431-064)
DOC.criteria: Patients must complete the doubleblind base study (MK043106400)(NCT00397631) and have at least 75% compliance with study medication during the base study treatment period. Women of childbearing potential must continue to comply with the protocolspecified contraceptive methods
